name: CORS proxy
description: An Express CORS proxy with compression, caching and whitelists.

LOG_LEVEL.description: The logging level to use. Permitted values, in order of priority: emerg, alert, crit, error, warning, notice, info, debug

ORIGIN_WHITELIST.description: A comma-separated list of domain names allowed to use the proxy. Example: foo.com,www.foo.com

CACHE_TIME.description: Amount of time, in milliseconds, that cacheable responses will be stored in Redis. Omit or set to 0 to disable caching.
